question: Who has been appointed as the Managing Director and Group Chief Executive Officer of the credit rating agency ICRA Ltd?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s leading credit rating agency ICRA Ltd has appointed N Sivaraman as the Managing Director and Group Chief Executive Officer.
The appointment has been made for three years with effect from August 10. His tenure may also be extended for two more years. He had held senior positions in L&T Finance Holdings and he has served as the Chief Operating Officer at IL&FS till July 31, 2020.
